meanings.definition: A small mammal with rounded ears and no external tail, found in mountainous regions.
meanings.sent1: Pikas are small animals that live in the mountains.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of pikas playing near the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The pika family had a picnic on the rocky hill.
meanings.sent4: The pikas scurried around like tiny mountain explorers.
meanings.sent5: The cute pikas with round ears are easy to spot in the rocky terrain.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'pika'.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the pikas running around the field!
meanings.sent2: The pikas in the zoo were very active today.
meanings.sent3: The pikas gathered to discuss their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The pikas in the story came to life in the children's imagination.
meanings.sent5: The group of pikas chattered happily in their burrow.
